dl.dd: Located about 3 km north of Guysborough on Route 16.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: The camping park is open from June 17 to Sept. 12 for the 2011 Season offering a 35 site wooded campground, and picnic area. The picnic area is open until mid October. The campground has water outlets and a trailer dump station.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
